job_title: Missionforce - Associate Forward Deployed Engineer (FDE), Public Sector
job_description:
• Become a Trusted Partner and Collaborate Directly with End-Users in classified and unclassified environments to deeply understand mission needs, operational challenges, and strategic goals and translate them into technical implementations using Salesforce’s multi-cloud portfolio.
• You'll directly push its capabilities to the limit, developing bespoke intelligent agents, automating intricate business processes, and crafting intuitive user experiences that deliver tangible value.
• Prototype and Iterate Rapidly to develop proofs-of-concept and minimum viable products, coding alongside client teams to demonstrate capabilities and gather feedback for iterative refinement.
• 3-7 years of experience in software engineering, solutions architecture, or systems integration.
• Strong background in Computer Science or a related engineering discipline.
• Hands-on experience building solutions with AI/LLM technologies, including integrating LLMs, applying AI orchestration frameworks, and prompt engineering techniques.
• Experience with data integration, API design, ETL, and AI/ML model deployment.
• Experience working in or adjacent to secure environments.

• Hardware Engineering, Sophia Antipolis, Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, France Experienced Professionals.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• In this role, you will play a key part in defining software requirements, designing embedded solutions, and verifying system performance, ensuring our maintenance systems meet the evolving needs of modern aircraft.
• The ideal candidate will bring hands‑on experience with system‑level testing, REST APIs, structured data formats, and embedded or IoT platforms to ensure the reliability, performance, and compliance of technologies deployed across mission‑critical environments worldwide.
• You’ll bridge engineering and IT to ensure complex aerospace development ecosystems perform at scale, meet rigorous standards, and align with regulatory and export‑controlled requirements.
• This position is ideal for engineers experienced in modern software development methodologies, debugging, and performance optimization, who thrive in highly technical, cross‑functional environments.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements You will report directly to our Senior Engineering Manager and you will work out of our Phoenix, AZ location on a Hybrid work schedule.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• Software Engr II Locations Hamilton, NJ, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date02/17/2026 Trending Software Engr II Locations Hamilton, NJ, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date02/13/2026 Trending Software Engr II Locations Richmond, VA, United States (On-site) Posting Date02/06/2026 Trending Advanced Software Engr Locations Mason, OH, United States (Hybrid) Posting Date02/06/2026 Trending Software Engineer & Computer Science - Recent Grad/Full Time Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending As a Recent Graduate here at Honeywell, you will have the opportunity to kickstart your career by working alongside experienced professionals in a dynamic and innovative environment.
